title: Teamcenter Rights Management eXtension - Setup
cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel Teamcenter RMX Setup?
start_service_error: The service cannot be started, either because it is disabled or because it has no enabled devices associated with it.

welcome_page.welcome_para: Welcome to the installation wizard of
welcome_page.copyright_message: WARNING: This product is protected by copyright law and international treaties.
welcome_page.help_note: Before you proceed make sure following information is with you.
welcome_page.server: - Teamcenter Server root administrator infodba password
welcome_page.jpc: - NextLabs Policy Controller host and port
welcome_page.skydrm: - NextLabs SkyDRM Router URL, AppId and AppKey
welcome_page.nextlabs_template:
If you have an older version of RMX (below v3.5) installed, please deploy 
the nextlabs transition template via TEM before proceeding with this installation. 

This step is important to address template changes between the old and new versions.
Please click the acknowledge button to continue with your current installation, 
otherwise cancel this installation and deploy the transition template via TEM first. 

If you are unsure, contact NextLabs Support.

install_dir_page.heading: Installation Directory
install_dir_page.install_dir_help_note: Enter a folder path where this application is to be installed.
install_dir_page.tc_root_help_note: Enter the TC_ROOT folder of the Teamcenter.
install_dir_page.tc_root_empty: TC_ROOT can be empty if Teamcenter is not installed.
install_dir_page.tc_data_help_note: Enter the TC_DATA folder of the Teamcenter server.
install_dir_page.tc_data_empty: TC_DATA can be empty if Teamcenter server is not installed.

disp_root_page.heading: Teamcenter Dispatcher Installation Directory
disp_root_page.help_note: Dispatcher Root can be empty if Teamcenter Dispatcher feature is not installed.

creo_dir_page.heading: Creo Parametric Installation Directory
creo_dir_page.help_note: Creo Parametric Directory can be empty if Creo Parametric is not installed.
creo_dir_page.help_note_ipem: IPEM directory can be empty if Creo Parametric is not run on managed mode.

solidworks_dir_page.heading: SolidWorks Installation Directory
solidworks_dir_page.help_note: SolidWorks Directory can be empty if SolidWorks is not installed.
solidworks_dir_page.help_note_swim: SWIM directory can be empty if SolidWorks is not run on managed mode.

autocad_dir_page.heading: AutoCAD Installation Directory
autocad_dir_page.help_note: AutoCAD Directory can be empty if AutoCAD Software is not installed.

catia_dir_page.heading: CATIA Installation Directory
catia_dir_page.help_note: CATIA Directory can be empty if CATIA Software is not installed.

bb_dir_page.heading: Briefcase Browser Installation Directory
bb_dir_page.help_note: Briefcase Browser Root can be empty if Briefcase Browser is not installed.

install.heading: Components to be Install
install.module_selection: The selected components and features are being installed.

remove.heading: Components to be Uninstall
remove.module_selection: The selected components and features are being uninstalled.

upgrade.heading: Components to be Upgrade
upgrade.module_selection: The selected components and features are being upgraded.

jpc_remote_setting_page.heading: NextLabs Policy Controller
jpc_remote_setting_page.jpc_eva_port: Policy Controller Port for Policy Evaluation

tcsoa_page.heading: TCSOA Information
tcsoa_page.help_note: You can skip this info and configure later via Teamcenter rich client.

success.heading: Installation Summary
success.help_note: The following components and features have been installed successfully.

fail.heading: Installation Failed
fail.help_note: Some error occurs, please check the log file in currect folder.

success.heading: Uninstallation Summary
success.help_note: The following components and features have been uninstalled successfully.

fail.heading: Uninstallation Failed
fail.help_note: Some error occurs, please check the log file in currect folder.

success.heading: Upgrade Summary
success.help_note: The following components and features have been upgraded successfully.

fail.heading: Upgrade Failed
fail.help_note: Some error occurs, please check the log file in current folder.

rollback.heading: Rollback Summary
rollback.help_note: The system has been rolled back to its original state.

installation_summary_page.delete_warn: WARN: Some files being used by Teamcenter are not deleted, please refer to warning message in installer.log.

ErrorMsgTemplate: The %s you specified is not valid: %s

validator_errors.dir: the directory is not exist or valid
validator_errors.dir_contain_space: the directory specified contains space, which is not supported
validator_errors.file: the file you specified is not exist

progress_log_messages.translator_rights_checker: Translator Rights Checker for Dispatcher Feature...

warning_message.jce_not_found: JCEPolicySDK files is not found in shared_libs
warning_message.jce_not_found_warning: WARNING: JCEPolicySDK files is not found in shared_libs. Please manually replace JCEPolicySDK by following our document.

hover_msg.nxl_template: Require Teamcenter Foundation and Translation Service installed.
hover_msg.workflow_initial_protection: Require Teamcenter Foundation or 2-tier RAC installed
hover_msg.active_workspace_support: Require Teamcenter Active WorkSpace Client installed.
